text: Theo Schneider (born 23 August 1960 in Dortmund) is a German former footballer who is a youth advisor for Ferencváros. He was manager of SC Wiedenbrück 2000 until April 2014. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:German football managers Category:Arminia Bielefeld managers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Sportspeople from Dortmund
title: Theo Schneider
